status.name: ER_BUS_ERRORS
status.comment: Error code block for ALLJOYN wire protocol

status.name: ER_BUS_READ_ERROR
status.comment: Error attempting to read

status.name: ER_BUS_WRITE_ERROR
status.comment: Error attempting to write

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_VALUE_TYPE
status.comment: Read an invalid value type

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_HEADER_FIELD
status.comment: Read an invalid header field

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_SIGNATURE
status.comment: Signature was badly formed

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_OBJ_PATH
status.comment: Object path contained an illegal character

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_MEMBER_NAME
status.comment: A member name contained an illegal character

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_INTERFACE_NAME
status.comment: An interface name contained an illegal character

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_ERROR_NAME
status.comment: An error name contained an illegal character

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_BUS_NAME
status.comment: A bus name contained an illegal character

status.name: ER_BUS_NAME_TOO_LONG
status.comment: A name exceeded the permitted length

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_LENGTH
status.comment: Length of an array was not a multiple of the array element size

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_VALUE
status.comment: Parsed value in a message was invalid (e.g. boolean > 1)

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_HDR_FLAGS
status.comment: Uknown header flags

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_BODY_LEN
status.comment: Body length was to long or too short

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_HEADER_LEN
status.comment: Header length was to long or too short

status.name: ER_BUS_UNKNOWN_SERIAL
status.comment: Serial number in a method response was unknown

status.name: ER_BUS_UNKNOWN_PATH
status.comment: Path in a method call or signal was unknown

status.name: ER_BUS_UNKNOWN_INTERFACE
status.comment: Interface in a method call or signal was unknown

status.name: ER_BUS_ESTABLISH_FAILED
status.comment: Failed to establish a connection

status.name: ER_BUS_UNEXPECTED_SIGNATURE
status.comment: Signature in message was not what was expected

status.name: ER_BUS_INTERFACE_MISSING
status.comment: Interface header field is missing

status.name: ER_BUS_PATH_MISSING
status.comment: Object path header field is missing

status.name: ER_BUS_MEMBER_MISSING
status.comment: Member header field is missing

status.name: ER_BUS_REPLY_SERIAL_MISSING
status.comment: Reply-Serial header field is missing

status.name: ER_BUS_ERROR_NAME_MISSING
status.comment: Error Name header field is missing

status.name: ER_BUS_INTERFACE_NO_SUCH_MEMBER
status.comment: Interface does not have the requested member

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_SUCH_OBJECT
status.comment: Object does not exist

status.name: ER_BUS_OBJECT_NO_SUCH_MEMBER
status.comment: Object does not have the requested member (on any interface)

status.name: ER_BUS_OBJECT_NO_SUCH_INTERFACE
status.comment: Object does not have the requested interface

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_SUCH_INTERFACE
status.comment: Requested interface does not exist

status.name: ER_BUS_MEMBER_NO_SUCH_SIGNATURE
status.comment: Member exists but does not have the requested signature

status.name: ER_BUS_NOT_NUL_TERMINATED
status.comment: A string or signature was not NUL terminated

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_SUCH_PROPERTY
status.comment: No such property for a GET or SET operation

status.name: ER_BUS_SET_WRONG_SIGNATURE
status.comment: Attempt to set a property value with the wrong signature

status.name: ER_BUS_PROPERTY_VALUE_NOT_SET
status.comment: Attempt to get a property whose value has not been set

status.name: ER_BUS_PROPERTY_ACCESS_DENIED
status.comment: Attempt to set or get a property failed due to access rights

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_TRANSPORTS
status.comment: No physical message transports were specified

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_TRANSPORT_ARGS
status.comment: Missing or badly formatted transports args specified

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_ROUTE
status.comment: Message cannot be routed to destination

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_ENDPOINT
status.comment: An endpoint with given name cannot be found

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_SEND_PARAMETER
status.comment: Bad parameter in send message call

status.name: ER_BUS_UNMATCHED_REPLY_SERIAL
status.comment: Serial number in method call reply message did not match any method calls

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_SENDER_ID
status.comment: Sender identifier is invalid

status.name: ER_BUS_TRANSPORT_NOT_STARTED
status.comment: Attempt to send on a transport that has not been started

status.name: ER_BUS_EMPTY_MESSAGE
status.comment: Attempt to deliver an empty message

status.name: ER_BUS_NOT_OWNER
status.comment: A bus name operation was not permitted because sender does not own name

status.name: ER_BUS_SET_PROPERTY_REJECTED
status.comment: Application rejected a request to set a property

status.name: ER_BUS_CONNECT_FAILED
status.comment: Connection failed

status.name: ER_BUS_REPLY_IS_ERROR_MESSAGE
status.comment: Response from a method call was an ERROR message

status.name: ER_BUS_NOT_AUTHENTICATING
status.comment: Not in an authentication conversation

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_LISTENER
status.comment: A listener is required to implement the requested function

status.name: ER_BUS_BT_TRANSPORT_ERROR
status.comment: The Bluetooth transport reported an error

status.name: ER_BUS_NOT_ALLOWED
status.comment: The operation attempted is not allowed

status.name: ER_BUS_WRITE_QUEUE_FULL
status.comment: Write failed because write queue is full

status.name: ER_BUS_ENDPOINT_CLOSING
status.comment: Operation not permitted on endpoint in process of closing

status.name: ER_BUS_INTERFACE_MISMATCH
status.comment: Received two conflicting definitions for the same interface

status.name: ER_BUS_MEMBER_ALREADY_EXISTS
status.comment: Attempt to add a member to an interface that already exists

status.name: ER_BUS_PROPERTY_ALREADY_EXISTS
status.comment: Attempt to add a property to an interface that already exists

status.name: ER_BUS_IFACE_ALREADY_EXISTS
status.comment: Attempt to add an interface to an object that already exists

status.name: ER_BUS_ERROR_RESPONSE
status.comment: Received an error response to a method call

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_XML
status.comment: XML data is improperly formatted

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_CHILD_PATH
status.comment: The path of a child object is incorrect given it's parent's path

status.name: ER_BUS_OBJ_ALREADY_EXISTS
status.comment: Attempt to add a RemoteObject child that already exists

status.name: ER_BUS_OBJ_NOT_FOUND
status.comment: Object with given path does not exist

status.name: ER_BUS_CANNOT_EXPAND_MESSAGE
status.comment: Expansion information for a compressed message is not available

status.name: ER_BUS_NOT_COMPRESSED
status.comment: Attempt to expand a message that is not compressed

status.name: ER_BUS_ALREADY_CONNECTED
status.comment: Attempt to connect to a bus which is already connected

status.name: ER_BUS_NOT_CONNECTED
status.comment: Attempt to use a bus attachment that is not connected to a bus daemon

status.name: ER_BUS_ALREADY_LISTENING
status.comment: Attempt to listen on a bus address which is already being listened on

status.name: ER_BUS_KEY_UNAVAILABLE
status.comment: The request key is not available

status.name: ER_BUS_TRUNCATED
status.comment: Insufficient memory to copy data

status.name: ER_BUS_KEY_STORE_NOT_LOADED
status.comment: Accessing the key store before it is loaded

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_AUTHENTICATION_MECHANISM
status.comment: There is no authentication mechanism

status.name: ER_BUS_BUS_ALREADY_STARTED
status.comment: Bus has already been started

status.name: ER_BUS_BUS_NOT_STARTED
status.comment: Bus has not yet been started

status.name: ER_BUS_KEYBLOB_OP_INVALID
status.comment: The operation requested cannot be performed using this key blob

status.name: ER_BUS_INVALID_HEADER_CHECKSUM
status.comment: Invalid header checksum in an encrypted message

status.name: ER_BUS_MESSAGE_NOT_ENCRYPTED
status.comment: Security policy requires the message to be encrypted

status.name: ER_BUS_INVALID_HEADER_SERIAL
status.comment: Serial number in message header is invalid

status.name: ER_BUS_TIME_TO_LIVE_EXPIRED
status.comment: Message time-to-live has expired

status.name: ER_BUS_HDR_EXPANSION_INVALID
status.comment: Something is wrong with a header expansion

status.name: ER_BUS_MISSING_COMPRESSION_TOKEN
status.comment: Compressed headers require a compression token

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_PEER_GUID
status.comment: There is no GUID for this peer

status.name: ER_BUS_MESSAGE_DECRYPTION_FAILED
status.comment: Message decryption failed

status.name: ER_BUS_SECURITY_FATAL
status.comment: A fatal security failure

status.name: ER_BUS_KEY_EXPIRED
status.comment: An encryption key has expired

status.name: ER_BUS_CORRUPT_KEYSTORE
status.comment: Key store is corrupt

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_CALL_FOR_REPLY
status.comment: A reply only allowed in response to a method call

status.name: ER_BUS_NOT_A_COMPLETE_TYPE
status.comment: Signature must be a single complete type

status.name: ER_BUS_POLICY_VIOLATION
status.comment: Message does not meet policy restrictions

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_SUCH_SERVICE
status.comment: Service name is unknown

status.name: ER_BUS_TRANSPORT_NOT_AVAILABLE
status.comment: Transport cannot be used due to underlying mechanism disabled by OS

status.name: ER_BUS_INVALID_AUTH_MECHANISM
status.comment: Authentication mechanism is not valid

status.name: ER_BUS_KEYSTORE_VERSION_MISMATCH
status.comment: Key store has wrong version number

status.name: ER_BUS_BLOCKING_CALL_NOT_ALLOWED
status.comment: A synchronous method call from within handler is not permitted.

status.name: ER_BUS_SIGNATURE_MISMATCH
status.comment: MsgArg(s) do not match signature.

status.name: ER_BUS_STOPPING
status.comment: The bus is stopping.

status.name: ER_BUS_METHOD_CALL_ABORTED
status.comment: The method call was aborted.

status.name: ER_BUS_CANNOT_ADD_INTERFACE
status.comment: An interface cannot be added to an object that is already registered.

status.name: ER_BUS_CANNOT_ADD_HANDLER
status.comment: A method handler cannot be added to an object that is already registered.

status.name: ER_BUS_KEYSTORE_NOT_LOADED
status.comment: Key store has not been loaded

status.name: ER_BUS_MEDIA_STREAM_NOT_FOUND
status.comment: Media stream was not found

status.name: ER_BUS_MEDIA_STREAM_OPEN
status.comment: Media stream is open

status.name: ER_BUS_MEDIA_STREAM_CLOSED
status.comment: Media stream is closed

status.name: ER_BUS_MEDIA_STREAM_EXISTS
status.comment: Media stream is already added

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_SUCH_HANDLE
status.comment: Handle is not in the handle table

status.name: ER_BUS_HANDLES_NOT_ENABLED
status.comment: Passing of handles is not enabled for this connection

status.name: ER_BUS_HANDLES_MISMATCH
status.comment: Message had more handles than expected
